ACHAR.doc: ACHAR(I) returns the character at position I in the ASCII collating sequence. [F90]

ADJUSTL.doc: ADJUSTL(STRING) left-justifies a string by removing leading blanks. [F90]

ADJUSTR.doc: ADJUSTR(STRING) right-justifies a string by removing trailing blanks. [F90]

IACHAR.doc: IACHAR(C) returns the position of character C in the ASCII collating sequence. [F90]

LEN_TRIM.doc: LEN_TRIM(STRING) returns the length of a string without trailing blanks. [F90]

REPEAT.doc: REPEAT(STRING,NCOPIES) concatenates NCOPIES copies of STRING. [F90]

SCAN.doc: SCAN(STRING,SET) returns position of first character in STRING that is in SET. [F90]

TRIM.doc: TRIM(STRING) removes trailing blank characters from a string. [F90]

VERIFY.doc: VERIFY(STRING,SET) returns position of first character in STRING not in SET. [F90]
